channel.title: CVE Feed for WebberZone -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WebberZone -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47238|2024-08-02T21:09:35.782Z -- webberzone -- top%2010%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20popular%20posts%20by%20webberzone
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WebberZone Top 10 – WordPress Popular posts by WebberZone plugin <= 3.3.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-29142|2024-08-02T01:10:53.805Z -- webberzone -- better%20search%20%E2%80%93%20relevant%20search%20results%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WebberZone Better Search – Relevant search results for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Better Search – Relevant search results for WordPress: from n/a through 3.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-29142|2024-06-04T17:57:01.555Z -- webberzone -- better%20search%20%E2%80%93%20relevant%20search%20results%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WebberZone Better Search – Relevant search results for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Better Search – Relevant search results for WordPress: from n/a through 3.3.0.
